ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Medium Sizes
ygData.msgSnippet: Medium bronze is dropped in Perma by elite goblin something or others, the spot can be pretty tough considering what lingers around the area.  Ice giant
ygData.messageBody:
Medium bronze is dropped in Perma by elite goblin something or others, the
spot can be pretty tough considering what lingers around the area. Ice
giant diplomat (however he is behind some doors so as long as you don't AE
you should be ok), Zaharn spawns in that spot as well and some others. What
I would suggest you do is go to SolA and take the safe room zone to SolB.
It seems that greater kobolds drop medium bronze a lot more frequently than
the gobs in perma, plus the area is usually pretty safe. A group of level
25+ or so can take out one kobold pretty easily, the higher you are the
better your chances though.

Weiland, damn near a mana pump on Erollisi Marr

> My Musical Friends,
> I've seen maybe two pieces of medium bronze EVER. =) Ok, so where does it
> drop? Someone asked me last night, upon telling him i made a SHD, "Let's
go
> hunt in Najena." Does medium sized bronze drop there off <30 mobs? In
> addition, I'd like to verify that SHD's do have class specific armor... is
> it the Darkforge? If so, I'll just look it up on a eqshadowknights page or
> something. No need to go into specifics, seeing this is a bard list.
>
> One last thing... What's a good slasher i can camp for this poor little
guy?
>
> Dark Reaver is SHD only right? Is Pain Bringer WAR only? It sticks in my
> mind as such... Well ok.. Thank you all in advance for your advice and
help.
>
> Look forward to seeing you on! =)
>
> Pava Rahti <currently happy tagless>
> Bard of 30 measures
> Cazic Thule
